name: Doppler's Colors
description:
Interactive demonstration of doppler shift of a
star's light in 2D space.
     Press the arrow keys to move around the Star and
see how the color shifts with movement.
     The bottom right corner shows what shift an
Observer would see from far off the bottom of the
screen, represented by a telescope along the bottom.

Available in browser at https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/186304502/
